comment.author: 78822436@N02
comment._content:
Even when I'm feeling completely like a novice student-of-arts in general, there seems to be a rift purposely made within my abilities to embrace categorised forms of creativity that look to
be differentiated between kinds of synthesised / robotic features... and another type of spark 
which consists entirely of PAINT. From the first day i ever stepped foot into this museum, all i ever wanted to be was a decent painter. Since all the other biometric & geometric exhibitions seem to remind me of my failings as a TECHIE. So if you want me to stop dropping in. Give me some hands on, council sponsored hints and tips. You're all so pretty portraiture!
